description:
Three brothers run from a demon, a priest spends a night in a tree, and the Sun, Moon, and Thunder come to an agreement. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitoashi Senri no Waraji / Yamabushi to Shiroi Ookami / Tsukihi no Tatsu no wa Hayai
The Thousand League Sandals / The Mountain Priest & the White Wolf / The Days Pass So Fast
一足千里のわらじ / 山伏と白い狼 / 月日のたつのは早い
